en-US.name: Premium Greetings
en-US.summary: Tired of your boring 'hello'? Let's turn it up a notch with premium greetings!
en-US.description: Premium greetings is an example of using In Skill Purchases with Alexa Skills. By purchasing premium greetings, your skill can say 'hello' with more pizzazz.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: Make your day with Premium greetings!
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Thank you for purchasing Premium Greetings!

testingInstructions: Say Buy It Now to begin the purchase flow.
